LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Axe.label: hatchet
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Axe.description: A small, single-handed axe designed for quick, repeated strikes. Its light weight and short handle allow for fast swinging speed. Using a hatchet increases the plant harvest yield slightly.
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Axe.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_Axe.tools.1.label: edge
